title: Process a Re-entry Request
description: A visitor at a zoo needs to leave temporarily to get something from their car and wants to ensure they can get back in.

tasks.description: Explain the re-entry policy to the visitor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent informs the visitor that re-entry is allowed on the same day.

tasks.description: Provide the visitor with a hand stamp or re-entry pass.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gives the visitor the necessary credential for re-entry.

tasks.description: Instruct the visitor on which entrance to use when they return.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions for re-entry.
